sequence.speaker: momonga
sequence.text: Let me tell you about the history of Nazarick, {mc.name}.

sequence.speaker: momonga
sequence.text: It was created by the guild {characters.momonga.name} as our base of operations.

sequence.speaker: mc
sequence.text: That's impressive. How many floors does it have?

sequence.speaker: momonga
sequence.text: Nazarick has ten floors, each with its own unique characteristics and guardians.

sequence.speaker: momonga
sequence.text: Precisely. Each floor has a guardian who protects it and maintains its functions.

sequence.speaker: albedo
sequence.text: And I, {characters.albedo.title}, am the Supreme Guardian of the 1st to 4th floors!

sequence.speaker: mc
sequence.text: It's fascinating to learn about this place. Thank you for sharing, {characters.momonga.title}.

sequence.speaker: momonga
sequence.text: You're welcome, {mc.name}. There's much more to discover about our world.
